titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for the vessel OLD HAT.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/3/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
